title: Pea Ridge National Military Park: Work With Us
body: Work With Us       2016 YCC Application   Pea Ridge National Military Park is accepting applications for the Youth Conservation (YCC) program to work five (5) days per week for a minimum of eight weeks. The program will begin when school ends. Pay is $8.00 per hour. Work hours will consist of eight (8) hours per day with a half-hour lunch, or 40 hours per week. Enrollees will work with park resource management or maintenance staff on a variety of tasks.
